name: Reflection Cascade
description: Can you create a cascade of at least 15 reflections? Position the 3 mirrors strategically to create multiple bouncing light paths.
hints: Try to position mirrors to create a series of bouncing reflections.
Arrange the mirrors so light can bounce back and forth between them multiple times.
Higher-order reflections (those that bounce off multiple mirrors) count toward your total.
Position the mirrors to create a 'hall of mirrors' effect with many bounces.
